languages.text: {n}Ксавьер предостерегающе вскидывает руку.{/n} "На вашем месте, госпожа Хейдари, я бы предпочел не привлекать внимание Инквизиции к своей персоне".
{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксавьер предостерегающе вскидывает руку.{/n} "На вашем месте, госпожа Хейдари, я бы предпочел не привлекать внимание Инквизиции к своей персоне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."
{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."
{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."
{n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎举起一只手，做了个警告意味的手势。{/n}“如果我是你，海达利女士，我会尽量不要引起审判庭的注意。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎举起一只手，做了个警告意味的手势。{/n}“如果我是你，海达利女士，我会尽量不要引起审判庭的注意。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar levanta la mano a modo de advertencia.{/n} «Señora Heydari, en su lugar me lo pensaría mucho antes de atraer la atención de la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar levanta la mano a modo de advertencia.{/n} «Señora Heydari, en su lugar me lo pensaría mucho antes de atraer la atención de la Inquisición».

languages.text: {n}カルカサルが手を上げて警告する。{/n}「ヘイダリ女史、もし私があなたなら、無用に異端審問庁の注意を引かぬように努めるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルが手を上げて警告する。{/n}「ヘイダリ女史、もし私があなたなら、無用に異端審問庁の注意を引かぬように努めるだろう」

languages.text: {n}Calcazar lève une main en guise d'avertissement.{/n} « Si j'étais vous, maîtresse Heydari, j'éviterais d'attirer l'attention de l'Inquisition sur ma personne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar lève une main en guise d'avertissement.{/n} « Si j'étais vous, maîtresse Heydari, j'éviterais d'attirer l'attention de l'Inquisition sur ma personne. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar erhebt warnend eine Hand.{/n} "Ich an Eurer Stelle, Herrin Heydari, würde mich bemühen, die Aufmerksamkeit der Inquisition nicht auf mich selbst zu lenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar erhebt warnend eine Hand.{/n} "Ich an Eurer Stelle, Herrin Heydari, würde mich bemühen, die Aufmerksamkeit der Inquisition nicht auf mich selbst zu lenken."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, uyarı maksatlı olarak elini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari, yerinde olsam Engizisyon'un dikkatini şahsım üzerine çekmekle uğraşmazdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar raises a hand in warning.{/n} "If I were you, Mistress Heydari, I would endeavour not to draw the Inquisition's attention to my person."
